Uses of Interface
jtxt.DrawableSurface

  • Packages that use DrawableSurface 
    Package Description
    jtxt  
    jtxt.emulator  

    • Uses of DrawableSurface in jtxt

      Classes in jtxt that implement DrawableSurface 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ANSIWriter
      Draws Components to an external source, such as a system console or other device which can be written to with an instance of OutputStream.
      Fields in jtxt declared as DrawableSurface 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected DrawableSurface Terminal.surface
      The surface defines how Glyphs which are in the buffer are drawn to the screen.
      Methods in jtxt that return DrawableSurface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract DrawableSurface Terminal.createDrawableSurface(int width, int height)
      Initializes the area that text will be rendered to.
      protected DrawableSurface SystemConsole.createDrawableSurface(int width, int height)
